channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Sharebar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Sharebar

item.title: CVE-2022-1626|2024-08-03T00:10:03.787Z -- unknown -- sharebar
item.description: The Sharebar WordPress plugin through 1.4.1 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack and also lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping in some of them
